nodes.text: 6E-O3 was a droid that sold gear to the forces of the reconstituted Sith Empire forces while stationed on CZ-198, during the time of the Galactic War between the Sith Empire and Galactic Republic. Its droid model was similar in function and appearance to Imperial DroidWorks' Seneschal-series factotum droid.
6E-O3 was first added as a Reputation Vendor to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.3. The droid was later removed in Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015.
